mapper.select: SELECT S.SONG_NAME AS songName, A.ALBUM_NAME AS albumName, AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, G.GENRE_NAME AS genre, A.ALBUM_ID AS albumId, A.ALBUM_IMG AS albumImg, AR.ARTIST_ID AS artistId FROM SONG S JOIN ALBUM A ON S.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID JOIN ARTIST AR ON S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID JOIN GENRE G ON S.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID WHERE S.SONG_NAME LIKE '%' || #{songName} || '%' OR AR.ARTIST_NAME LIKE '%' || #{songName} || '%' OR A.ALBUM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{songName} || '%'
